> **⚠️ WARNING:** If you are reporting a "Low Score", please verify your repo actually has a README before filing a bug. The tool is designed to be harsh.

## Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## The Forensic Result
What score did the auditor give you? What was the "Tier"?
*(Screenshots of the audit result are highly encouraged)*

## Expected Behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Reproduction Steps
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## Environment
 - **OS:** [e.g. Windows, macOS, Linux]
 - **Browser:** [e.g. Chrome, Safari]
 - **Node Version:** [e.g. 18.x]
